column2: A complete class diagram is submitted in valid UML 2.0. All class relations are shown. Abstract classes and (pure) virtual functions are indicated as such.
Polymorphism can be seen in the class diagram.
At least 4 design patterns are evident in the UML.
The distribution of classes among the team members is indicated through colors and a color key.
5 to 6 class per team member. 1 to 2 less for the team lead.
Header files corresponding to the UML files are submitted.
A project information file is submitted as required.
